name: Cybernetic Arm
description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the target in.
source: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the selected target to you, or you to the target. Deal **100%** damage on hit, strongly suspend the target, and regenerate weapon charge by **300**. Can be used to access hard-to-reach areas, and stores up to 2 charges at a time. Regain 1 charge every 30 seconds.

advancement.description: Produce an EM shield that reduces damage taken by **20%** for 7 seconds.
Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Reduce final damage of targets hit by **30%** for 7 seconds.
